text: The men's 200 metres event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held at the Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion in Debrecen, Hungary between 13-14 July, 2007. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Visa Hongisto ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Vojtěch Šulc ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Rikki Fifton ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July Wind: -1.9m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
